nodes.text: Neimoidian space was a sector of the galaxy's Colonies region. It contained the planet Neimoidia, homeworld of the Neimoidian species, and their purse worlds of Cato Neimoidia, Deko Neimoidia, and Koru Neimoidia. During the Clone Wars, it initially declared itself neutral before aligning itself with the Confederacy of Independant Systems. During the Outer Rim Sieges, Republic forces were cleaning up the remaining Separatist resistance within Neimoidian space.
